verses.roman:
'bol 'bol' balena prabhu śrī-bāhu tuliyā
hari-dhvani kare loka ānande bhāsiyā

synonyms: bol—chant; bol—chant; balena—said; prabhu—the Lord; śrī-bāhu—His transcendental arms; tuliyā—raising; hari-dhvani kare—chanted the holy name Hari; loka—people; ānande bhāsiyā—floating in transcendental bliss.
translation: Raising His two arms, the Lord said, "Chant! Chant!" Floating in transcendental bliss, the people responded by chanting the holy name of Hari.
